alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 1:04PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Charles, northeastern Terrebonne and north central Lafourche Parishes through 145 PM CST... At 104 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raceland, or 7 miles northeast of Houma, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Hahnville, Lockport, Mathews, Paradis, Des Allemands, Luling, Boutte, Raceland, Ama, Bayou Gauche, Destrehan, St. Rose and New Sarpy. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 219 and 220. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
